thread.title: Nevada Appoints CIO Shannon Rahming

title: Nevada Appoints CIO Shannon Rahming
text:
19 Nevada Appoints CIO Shannon Rahming 
Government Technology: The recently appointed Nevada CIO Shannon Rahming is leading big projects across the state and looking for chances to collaborate. Rahming took over as interim CIO in March after the departure of David Gustafson, and lost her interim status on Oct. 8 to become the official replacement. Upgrades to statewide systems, broadband, healthcare and education are among the items on Rahming's agenda.
